name: Dereck Morgan
description: I am good humored, witty, intelligent, loving, caring, easy going, positive, well read and well traveled. Young in mind and heart, hopelessly romantic, a good communicator and a very good listener. Love to laugh. Can be happy in a crowd of 100’s or company of one. At first I’m usually a bit shy, but quickly warm up. In fact, my friends tell me that just get me started and I will take it from there.
